Reviews.Title: “Used to be good, not anymore”
Reviews.Author: Ledrak
Reviews.Content: I stayed here years ago, and then again just recently last year. This hotel used to be quite good, and was one of my preferred places to stay when in Miami. But they have really gone down hill. The rooms looked worn and dirty, especially the hallways. You used to be able to get a room if you came a little before the check-in time; not anymore. There was a line a the front desk, a wait to get to an clerk, and the whole building looks like it needs to be renovated. I would no longer stay here, and wouldn't recommend it to others either. Much better options out there.

Reviews.Title: “Nice room, rude staff”
Reviews.Author: carrotop
Reviews.Content: Hotel was full, which may have been reason staff was no very friendly. Breakfast was a hassle, since the hotel next door (Best Western) sends their guests to the Baymont. Very small room with many people trying to get their breakfast. Free airport transportation to/from MIA. A few places to eat within walking distance.

Reviews.Title: “Good value for price”
Reviews.Author: LWLToronto
Reviews.Content: As someone who has visited Miami frequently for work, I am familiar with many of the hotels around the airport. My wife and I stayed at the Baymont Inn several years ago, so we booked it again for 2 nights prior to our cruise. Hotel is close to airport, with great shopping and restaurants nearby. Booked well in advance and got a good rate. Room is fine and hotel is clean. Front desk staff was friendly. Breakfast is OK. Overall, very good value for a brief stay, compared to other more expensive hotels. Would stay again.

Reviews.Title: “Good hotel for an overnight between flights”
Reviews.Author: Christidis
Reviews.Content: I mainly chose this hotel because of the free shuttle service and good comments about its cleanliness. When I arrived at the airport, I called the hotel for the shuttle service and it took about 20-25 minutes to arrive. Check-in was efficient and friendly. Room was clean, bed also clean and comfortable. The building looks old, even though they tried updating things with furniture and bathroom fixtures. I also heard they were servicing the elevator, which had some people upset on the 4th floor because it was noisy, however I had requested to be in a quiet area and they put me on the first floor far away from the elevator. Breakfast was pretty good, coffee/tea/ hot chocolate, cereals, bread, oatmeal, pastries, bagels and cream cheese. Good basic continental breakfast. Also, free internet available in the lobby. Shuttle service back to the airport runs every hour. Really no complaints, great for an overnight stay in Miami!

Reviews.Title: “Nothing special”
Reviews.Author: bigsky55
Reviews.Content: 10 minute drive from airport, but easy enough to find. No shuttle. Small room, but did have 2 beds as requested. Vanity area is outside the bathroom so makes it easier to a couple people to get ready in morning. Hairdryer, coffee maker. Had 2 double beds that were basic; nothing cushy here. Carpeting has seen cleaner days, but nt terrible. Breakfast area to small for the families trying to use it. Sat in the lobby in easy chair to eat. Breakfast the basic carbs; cereals, toast, toaster waffles, pre-packaged muffins, bagels and cream cheese. Yogurt, good orange juice, coffee and milk, bananas, apples and oranges. OK but that's about it.

Reviews.Title: “Not Recommended, overrated by Hotwire”
Reviews.Author: mlspina
Reviews.Content: We recently stayed at this hotel after a cruise and booked it through Hotwire. We thought the location near the airport and highway was good, but that was it. The staff was unfriendly, the carpet in the halls was filthy, the rooms were dank and musty, the beds were horribly lumpy, and the carpet in the room was DAMP. At breeakfast the coffee was not refilled when it ran out and the breakfast area was a mess (from other patrons) but no staff cleaned it up. Overall I would NOT recommend this hotel. Hotwire lists it in their 2.5 star category but I believe it is overrated. I admit that we didnt complain to the staff (since they were unfriendly at check in anyway) but also since we arrived late and were too exhausted to deal with it and just wanted to sleep and go to the airport.

Reviews.Title: “Value for money”
Reviews.Author: nucleuskore
Reviews.Content: I have stayed at this hotel three times in the past year, taking a King, non-smoking all three times. It is a clean hotel, staff are friendly. The room is spacious and clean, nothing falling off. An off course all this at a good price, which is why I keep coming back. The location is good, close to the airport, miami international mall, dolphin mall, Walmart Doral. There is a Wendy's, Pizza Hut, Winn Dixie store and a CVS pharmacy close tot he hotel, maybe a minute's walk in the direction of the traffic signal. This is something that should be kept in mind as the hotel does not have a restaurant in-house. Complimentary Breakfast is "alright".

Reviews.Title: “Bring Your Own Breakfast”
Reviews.Author: dmichaelmiller
Reviews.Content: This hotel is clean and the rooms are comfortable. My only complaint is that the continental breakfast was woefully inadequate. In fairness, maybe it was because the motel was probably full to capacity the morning I tried to have breakfast. The selection of cereals was limited; the only fruit was a couple of oranges; no coffee and no signs of anybody about to make any either. No place to sit. Obviously too small for a full house of guests.

Reviews.Title: “Don't book here....RUN!”
Reviews.Author: Nana30096
Reviews.Content: This hotel was the dirtiest hotel that I have been to so far in my life. I have been to some motels cleaner than this hotel. Looks are definitely deceiving from the outside and the lobby area. The hallway carpets are filthy. The room carpet it worse. Our bathroom towels were not clean. The bed looked like a little kid jumped up and down on it right before we walked in. Our television was messing up, kept losing color. The only staff who spoke english where the front desk people and they were not the most pleasant people to deal with, no friendly greeting/smile. It was just not a good place to stay for the money. Please don't make the mistake. You might be better off next door at Best Western although they are owned by the same owner. Just find someplace else all together!

Reviews.Title: “NEVER MORE”
Reviews.Author: Jessy_Brazil
Reviews.Content: My friend and I spent just one night at this hotel and I must say "CHOOSE ANOTHER ONE!". The clerk didnÂ´t even care about us... we had too many bags (heavy ones), my friend was pregnant... she just said...I CANÂ´T DO ANYTHING, YOUÂ´LL HAVE TO CARRY YOUR OWN BAGS!. A Brazilian couple had just arrived at the hotel and they helped us with the bags... the room was stinky... it was supposed to be a NON SMOKING ROOM... but it was smelling cigarette smoke and the carpet was dirty... DISGUSTING! If youÂ´re wondering which hotel to stay at ...DONÂ´T STAY THERE!!!

Reviews.Title: “Expected better for the price.”
Reviews.Author: sbmj74
Reviews.Content: 1. Hotel room cleaners cant speak English. 2. Hotel representatives at front desk seems only in it for the money. 3. Washing machine not working for 3 of my 5 days there....reported it to front desk the very first day....nothing was done!

Reviews.Title: “Think about a dirty hotel. Now, think again...”
Reviews.Author: Rodbh71
Reviews.Content: Hi there! I'm not a high maintenance traveler. I usually stay at Holiday Inn around America and it's fine for me. Just stayed at this hotel for 2 days while in Miami and would like to share this information. The rooms are dirty. The bathroom is dirty. Ths baththub is incredibly dirty. The towels are terrible. That's it. Hope that it helps somebody.

Reviews.Title: “It's ok”
Reviews.Author: marieanddon
Reviews.Content: Stayed 1 night, got free airportshuttle after long wait and long drive to hotel. Reception area clean and welcoming. Staff efficient. Room 2beds old tv clean. Free wifi. Breakfast ok and free. Ok but found better deal nearer airport and Miami , so probably will not stay again

Reviews.Title: “Not what I expected...”
Reviews.Author: GSell
Reviews.Content: My husband and I stayed on February 28, 2011. The front desk folks were pleasant but not over-welcoming. Our room was disappointing. It was very muggy and the carpets were very damp -- in some spots even very wet. I put a towel down on the floor only to have it soak through with dark liquid. The carpets were absolutely filthy. We did ask to switch rooms and while the carpets were not wet, they were still damp. I was uncomfortable putting my luggage on the floor and I didn't take my shoes off until I crawled into bed. They Baymont was one of the cheaper hotels in the area, now I know why.

Reviews.Title: “Great value!`”
Reviews.Author: thequeen1073
Reviews.Content: This hotel was a great value for the money. The rooms were a good size, clean, and the beds were sooo comfortable that we did want to wake up! The front desk person was just ok, seemed like he wasn't very happy, but we didn't have any problems to speak of. It took us about 15 minutes to get to the airport from the hotel, but they do offer a free shuttle to the airport if you need it. We only stayed one night, but what time we did spend there, it was a great experience.

Reviews.Title: “terrible!”
Reviews.Author: Nic1975_36
Reviews.Content: At first glance, the hotel looks quite welcoming. Don't be fooled! When we got there, outside was clean and beautiful, so was the lobby. But the customer service was terrible. When we got there to check in, no one was at the front desk. The staff wasn't friendly. Then the room!!!!!!!! OMG - as you open the door, you literally walk into the bathroom! The sink is right there. The room was filthy. It was dusty, carpets were stained and even the sheets smelled. When I passed my finger on the bed head, it was full of dust. By the time I got up the next morning, I was sick. Then ofcourse, if the bedrooms were in that condition, we dreaded to think what condition their kitchen was in. The breakfast area was a very small spot in the lobby with just a few tables jammed to one side. We checked out immediately, having to pay a US$50 early check out fee. They are not willing to give a refund or credit, so be very mindful of this if you pay for your stay in advance. They don't have a customer service survey or anyone available to speak to about your complaints at the hotel and even on their website you can't leave comments. Not surprised! A total disappointment!!!

Reviews.Title: “A place to crash before going to or from the airport- what you pay for is what you get.”
Reviews.Author: adventuretraveller40
Reviews.Content: Standard budget hotel with no-frills. The bed was uncomfortable, the bathroom in disrepair. There were cigarette burns on the bedding and some holes in the carpet, but for the price (cheapest we could find that night) it was what I expected. The breakfast is not out at 6am sharp, so if you have an early flight don't count on getting anything. Pretty much what you pay for is what you get.

Reviews.Title: “Best Hotel Ever !!!!!!”
Reviews.Author: taylabarreto
Reviews.Content: I have stayed in this hotel a few times and i have to say that its a great place to stay. They have transportation to and from the airport which i find great !!!!! Every time i stay Ernesto shows me great homestyle hospitality. I would recomend this hotel to anyone.

Reviews.Title: “what a great hotel...great location”
Reviews.Author: mdoime
Reviews.Content: I stated in this hotel last week and it was awesome .I flew to miami for bussines but i found more than that . This hotel is the best ,even if it was for business only it was like vacation for me . The staff is the best , Diana tooked care of everything i need it , she helped me in everything , she treated me like a good friend.She told me that she is just starting in the job but i think that she is doing pretty good for a young girl like her..Im sure that ill be wanting to stay more often in this hotel with the help of people like her.

Reviews.Title: “Not Bad For The Money”
Reviews.Author: UncleMarkie
Reviews.Content: Having read reviews of hotels in Miami, especially of those around the airport that have a lot of cruise ship passengers coming through, and having experienced a couple of sub-par airport hotels on previous trips, I was pleasantly surprised by the Baymont Inn. While not perfect (I'd run a steam cleaner on the 4th floor hallway carpet -- not horrible, just coule be better), the shuttle runs every hour 6am to 10pm, everything worked, I got to check in several hours early, front desk helpful, restaurants within walking distance in all price ranges. Swimming pool had both shade and sun and enough chairs and loungers. Looks like they are redoing some of the rooms -- which I give them points since they are taking care of the property.

Reviews.Title: “Would not recommend this hotel to anyone!”
Reviews.Author: CJHAUEISEN
Reviews.Content: We were moved 3 times trying to find a room that was "clean" with no success. They "upgraded" us to a suite that was infested with tiny ants all over the place, a dirty toilet bowl and a fowl odor coming from the air conditioner/heater. The management team would not honor their satisfaction guarantee; we actually paid to stay here! (We were stupid enough to stay trying to give them the opportunity to make the room right). Traveler's - beware!

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel---check it out”
Reviews.Author: missTPA
Reviews.Content: WOW after reading the reviews for this hotel, I was afraid to book. But, I was only staying in Miami one night and then heading off to the port for a cruise, so I figured I could stand it for one night. After all, the price was nice, they had a complimentary shuttle bus from the airport, they would arrange my shuttle to the port at my designated time in the morning for a small fee, and they had complimentary hot breakfast and a pool. Not too bad. I was very impressed with the whole hotel. It was very clean. The staff was very friendly and helpful. My room was very clean and tidy. The only problem I could find is that the carpet was a little worn but thats it!! I have no idea where the rest of these people stayed that left reviews!!! This is not my idea of a dream hotel but for a day or two it definately is great. The hotel is near to several restaurants and fast food chains. All within a few minutes walking distance. I would definately stay here again. No problem!

Reviews.Title: “Will never stay here again”
Reviews.Author: knbn
Reviews.Content: Rooms were dirty, carpet torn, phone did not work, shower had mold in it.

Reviews.Title: “Are you going Shopping? This is the best you will get!!”
Reviews.Author: Shakita
Reviews.Content: I was on spring brake with my 3 kids and two of my daughter friends. 3 teenagers and two toddlers. Is convenient, everything you may need is there, the location is the best ever if you are going shopping that is. Spacious, good beds and decent rooms. We are travelers and we choose the hotel depending on the occasion. We were going shopping and this worked great. I wouldn't go there if I wanted to relax in a well decorated beautiful room. The carpet is stained and the staff is not very helpful. However for the price, what you get is worth it.

Reviews.Title: “Cheap in Pricing & Quality”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: I am not much of a hotel snob, as I haven't stayed at many hotels. However, this hotel is definitely not worth the money. The location is convenient, and on a quiet street. However, the rooms are hideous. The blankets and towels were dirty. The furniture was very old and looked unkept. The bathrooms were old and dirty too. The continental breakfast is a joke. There are bite-size bagels, and cereal in boxes. I was very glad about the cereal in the boxes, as I didn't trust their silverware. In addition, they did not refill on the food, so there was hardly anything left when we arrived for breakfast. I highly do NOT recommend this location. Please pay the additional $ to stay somewhere cleaner.

Reviews.Title: “Cheap but dirty..”
Reviews.Author: Rickard
Reviews.Content: The dirtiest room we ever stayed at.. The toilet was just a nightmare. The carpet was sticky and under the bed it was something alive. We opened the window but could never close it again. The positive I can say is that it is cheap, has good location to the airport, and the front des staff is very polite and friendly. Stay here if you just have to find a cheap hotel for just one night.

Reviews.Title: “NICE HOTEL, GOOD PRICE...”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: Very nice hotel, excellent continental breakfast, closer to Dolphin mall, International Mall, exit to the highways to Orlando, Ft. Lauderdale and very clean, the price is very good and I recommend this hotel to everyone who wants a big deal for a good price.. also they have free high speed internet at the lobby and the rooms.

Reviews.Title: “I would stay here again”
Reviews.Author: xwarrior26
Reviews.Content: We enjoyed staying at this hotel. Our room had a small refrigerator, a microwave, a coffeemaker and a small sink. The continental breakfast was delicious. They had French toast and waffles, oatmeal, fruit etc. The front desk clerk was also nice and friendly and everything was clean. The hotel was also close to a lot of restaurants and pharmacies.

HotelInfo.Name: Baymont Inn & Suites Miami Airport West
HotelInfo.Address: 3805 NW 107th Ave., Miami, FL 33178
